SEARCH
Module SC2002FOMS
Package Services

Class BranchManager

java.lang.Object
Services.BranchManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBranchManagement
public class BranchManager extends Object implements IBranchManagement
Manages branch operations including adding, removing, printing, and setting the status of branches. Implements the IBranchManagement interface.

  • Constructor Details

    • BranchManager

      public BranchManager()

  • Method Details

    • addBranch

      public void addBranch() throws IOException
      Adds a new branch after ensuring it does not already exist in the branch list. This method prompts the user for the branch's name, location, and staff quota, and automatically sets its status to OPEN. The new branch is then added to the branch list.
      Specified by:
      addBranch in interface IBranchManagement
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during file operations.

    • setBranchStatus

      public void setBranchStatus() throws IOException
      Sets the status of an existing branch to either OPEN or CLOSED based on user input. The method lists all branches, allows the user to select a branch, and prompts for the new status. It validates the input and updates the branch's status if the input is valid.
      Specified by:
      setBranchStatus in interface IBranchManagement
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during file operations.

    • removeBranch

      public void removeBranch() throws IOException
      Removes a branch specified by the user from the branch list. This method prompts the user to enter the name of the branch to be removed, checks if it exists, and removes it from the list if it does.
      Specified by:
      removeBranch in interface IBranchManagement
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during file operations.

    • printBranch

      public void printBranch(String filename) throws IOException
      Prints all branches along with their status from the branch list. This method reads the branch list from a file and displays each branch with its status.
      Specified by:
      printBranch in interface IBranchManagement
      Parameters:
      filename - The name of the file containing the branch information.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during file operations.
